title: Screenie
description:
Screenie is a revolutionary screenshot manager designed specifically for macOS Catalina.

With Screenie, you can drag screenshots from your menubar, preview and drag images from the Screenie Panel, and even search the text inside your images!

Taking advantage of cutting edge optical character recognition technology in macOS, Screenie 2 is the first app to let you search the text inside images in a convenient easy-to-use productivity tool.
